long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A youtube learning companion which helps you mark the timestamps of the important points of the video which helps you whenever you revisit the same video and tells you the checkpoints where you left last time which enhance your productivity and reduces the time consumption in searching the points again.
